layer.name: Order
layer.definition: Reality has patterns that can be discovered and used.

questions.text: Physical training works because the body adapts according to predictable principles ...

answers.4: generally — the body responds to training in known ways
answers.5: absolutely — adaptation follows consistent, discoverable laws
answers.2: possibly — but there's so much individual variation
answers.3: often — training usually helps, but not always predictably
answers.1: not reliably — some people train hard and don't improve

questions.text: There are discoverable principles for building physical capability ...

answers.4: many — there's real science to physical development
answers.5: clear, established principles — the path is well documented
answers.2: possibly — but I don't know them
answers.3: some — but they don't work for everyone

questions.text: Athletes consistently improving through systematic training suggests ...

answers.4: significant order — systematic training reliably produces results
answers.5: clear evidence — physical development follows laws anyone can apply
answers.2: maybe some order — but talent matters more
answers.3: partial order — systems help, but genetics set the ceiling
answers.1: nothing — they're just gifted to begin with

questions.text: The idea that physical capability is purely genetic or random is ...

answers.4: mostly wrong — capability is highly trainable
answers.5: completely wrong — systematic work produces predictable improvement
answers.2: partly true — genetics set hard limits
answers.3: mixed — genetics matter, but so does training
answers.1: mostly true — you have what you have

questions.text: The path to physical improvement can be mapped and followed ...

answers.4: mostly — proven methods work for most people
answers.5: absolutely — physical development is a well-understood science
answers.2: somewhat — but you mostly have to experiment
answers.3: partially — general directions exist, but details vary
answers.1: not really — it's different for everyone

remediation.advice: Physical training works because the body follows laws. Progressive overload, adaptation, recovery — these are patterns, not mysteries. The order is so reliable that entire industries are built on it. Learn the principles.

scripture.text: Do you not know that in a race all the runners run, but only one receives the prize? So run that you may obtain it.
